title: Jayce and Tear (Manamune)
body:
I am watching the SKT vs C9 game that was played today right now. The casters said that Tear was no longer a core item on Jayce, when i played him last, it  was, what has changed? (he got slight buffs on 6.18, is that why?)
{{champion:126}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3004}}

replies.body:
For Jayce nothing has changed.

Tear and the things it builds into however no longer grant mana regen.
Because mana regen needed to be removed from the game for some stupid reason.

I still build it on him, as it's a great power spike and the 15% refund on mana usage is great in combination with the mana returns from Essence Reaver and Hammer Form AAs.
The mana costs on thunderblows were reduced from 40/50/70/80/90 to 40 at all ranks while his hammer stance AP ratio was changed to bonus AD.
That would just make {{item:3004}} even more useful on him.
If you don't need the extra mana, then you don't need tear and its much better just to rush ad items.
unless you can get aa's off in hammer stance or a blue buff, your going to be oom as fuck early on.

Jayce being a caster champion uses a lot of mana quickly, he will always need the extra mana.
Having a large mana cost reduced doesn't change the fact that his combos or poke still take up a lot of mana.

Manamune is an AD item, and considering Jayce's base damage early game if you have a bit of penetration in your runes/masteries you wont need to rush AD until your Manamune is built.

I never/rarely get {{item:3004}}  any more because I don't read the new updates or stats much or I don't want to spend time building up the stacks lol. Unless the meta  starts wiping enemies aside hard then I start joining the meta wagon too xD

The nerf that made him reliant on tear were reverted.
**
patch 6.17**

 Thundering Blow

Mana cost reduced to 40 at all ranks from 40 / 50 / 60 / 70 / 80 / 90.

 Transform: Mercury Cannon /  Transform: Mercury Hammer
Hammer Stance bonus damage ratio changed to 40% bonus AD from 40% AP.

BUG FIX: Fixed a bug where Jayce could be locked out of basic attacking for a short duration upon swapping to Mercury Hammer.

**Patch 6.6**
To the Skies!.png To The Skies!
Damage increased to 40 / 80 / 120 / 160 / 200 / 240 from 30 / 70 / 110 / 150 / 190 / 230
AD ratio increased to (+ 120% bonus AD) from (+ 100% bonus AD)
Cost reduced to 40 at all ranks from 40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60 / 65



**the tl;dr**
On path 6.17 you can now max thundering blows without caring for the extra cost, before you really had to be careful about using it because you would run out of juice really fast.  The new bonus AD ratio made AD items even more favourable which in combination with the mana cost buffs made it possible to rush youmuu's without spending the first 750 gold on tear.
